definition: to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad
May you have a prosperous New Year! (New Year's greeting)

sentences.english: Mimi completely defused after listen to hypocrisy, turn to Lou issa says congratulations.
sentences.chinese: 咪咪聽後怒氣全消，轉而假意向盧伊薩表示恭喜。

sentences.english: Congratulations on coming this far in your Fundi course.
sentences.chinese: 恭喜您學習了這麼多方迪課程。

sentences.english: And began to salute him, Hail, King of the Jews!
sentences.chinese: 就厭賀他說，恭喜猶太人的王阿。

sentences.english: If you guessed the Anti-Mason Party, you win the cigar.
sentences.chinese: 如果你回答是反共濟黨的話，那麼恭喜你，你答對了。

sentences.english: The results of the interview came out, you are hired, Congratulations !
sentences.chinese: 面試成果出來了，你被登科了，恭喜你。

sentences.english: Congratulations, you’re obviously a saint and can stop reading now.
sentences.chinese: 恭喜你，你顯然是個聖人，現在可以不讀這篇文章了。

sentences.english: So congrats to KKR for making the list.
Karen. Wow - congratulations. What is the secret to your success?
sentences.chinese: 喔，那可要恭喜你了。你能成功有什麼祕訣麼？

sentences.english: Congratulations, you now have a new apartment!
sentences.chinese: 恭喜，你現在有一個新的公寓了。
恭喜恭喜，今天可是個良辰吉日啊。
恭喜恭喜，今天可是個良辰吉日啊。

sentences.english: I don't understand how you encounter so many girls, I must hand it apt ya.
sentences.chinese: 我真得恭喜你，不知你怎麼會遇到那麼多漂亮姑娘。

sentences.english: Boom, congratulations, we have just decimated this deck of cards.
sentences.chinese: 砰，恭喜，我們剛剛從十張卡片裏面抽走了一張。

sentences.english: Congratulations on winning 2009 Taipei Golden Horse for Best Supporting Actress.
sentences.chinese: 恭喜紅姐姐，奪得2009金馬獎最佳女配角。

definition: two simultaneous happy events in the family
to wish/to express good wishes/to pray/(old) wizard
to congratulate beforehand/to offer best wishes for
to congratulate respectfully/to express good wishes
to continue the struggle (idiom); to persist/unremitting efforts
(idiom) a good person, used to praise sb's moral integrity or courage
